name: Kaiu Shihobu
text: Reaction: After this character enters play - search your dynasty deck for any number of holdings, reveal them, and put them facedown underneath your stronghold province (out of play). Shuffle. Action: Put a facedown holding under your stronghold province into play in an unbroken non-stronghold province you control, discarding each other card in that province. Errata from the Imperial Law (2020-01-06)
